outcomeMeasures.title: Binge Eating Frequency (Continuous)
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating assessed by interview and reported as frequency in the past 28 days. Frequency is defined continuously.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Body Mass Index at 4 Months Post-Treatment From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI is calculated using measured height and weight. We report percent of baseline weight. Negative values indicate weight loss. Calculated by value at 4 months minus value at baseline
